xml.data:
Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 16 Micchattaniyatattika » 16.1 Paṭiccavāra » 16.1.3 Paccayānulomapaccanīya
Hetuduka
Micchattaniyatattika
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayānulomapaccanīya
Hetuduka
12.
2283Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe pañca, naadhipatiyā tīṇi, naanantare nasamanantare naaññamaññe naupanissaye pañca, napurejāte cha, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane pañca, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā pañca, novigate pañca. (Evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
2284Anulomapaccanīyaṃ.
